body_html:
I don't think we can feed SparseTensor to placeholder now. But we can feed the dense `ids` and `values` to construct SparseTensor to train. Here is the example to train and inference with the sparse libsvm data and convert to TFRecords. You can also export the model for TensorFlow Serving. Refer to https://github.com/tobegit3hub/deep_recommend_system/blob/master/sparse_classifier.py . Regards
…

I don't think we can feed SparseTensor to placeholder now. But we can feed
the dense `ids` and `values` to construct SparseTensor to train.

Here is the example to train and inference with the sparse libsvm data and
convert to TFRecords. You can also export the model for TensorFlow Serving.
Refer to
https://github.com/tobegit3hub/deep_recommend_system/blob/master/sparse_classifier.py
.

body:
I don't think we can feed SparseTensor to placeholder now. But we can feed
the dense `ids` and `values` to construct SparseTensor to train.

Here is the example to train and inference with the sparse libsvm data and
convert to TFRecords. You can also export the model for TensorFlow Serving.
Refer to
https://github.com/tobegit3hub/deep_recommend_system/blob/master/sparse_classifier.py
.


Regards
